Las_Vegas.The Forum Shops at Caesars:
The Forum Shops at Caesars (also known as simply The Forum) is a major 636,000-square-foot (59,100 m2) shopping mall connected to Caesars Palace on the Las Vegas Strip in Las Vegas, Nevada. Measured in terms of sales per square foot, it is the highest grossing mall in the United States.


== History ==
The mall was built as an extension wing of the main hotel and casino in 1992.
